item.title: Security Analyst Profile: Amanda Cantero Schilling
item.description:
Security Analyst Profile: Amanda Cantero Schilling
Defender Experts for XDR
"Securing the digital frontier is not just about stopping cyber threats; it's about understanding the ever-evolving landscape, fostering genuine connections with our customers, and embracing the endless possibilities that Artificial Intelligence brings to our cybersecurity toolset." - Amanda Cantero Schilling, Security Analyst
Meet Amanda Cantero Schilling, a highly skilled cybersecurity analyst on a mission to fortify the defenses of Microsoft Defender Experts for XDR customers. As a vigilant guardian of...
